p: Mice were separated into four groups of five mice in each. They were fasted overnight and then intraperitoneally administered MEBPL at the doses of 1000, 2000 and 3000 mg/kg, the only vehicle given to the mice of the control group. The animals were observed for three hours for any bizarre behaviour which included respiratory complexity, motor impairment and hyperexcitability. Moreover, the prevalence of mortality for individual groups was noted as much as 24 h after management [ 39].
